title: Chapter 4275 - Chapter 4275: 4274 Protected The Path Once Again!
body:
Chapter 4275 - Chapter 4275: 4274 Protected The Path Once Again!

Chapter 4275: 4274 protected the path once again!

Translator: 549690339

“It’s time for me to go out and take a look!”

The increase in his strength once again gave Wang Xian the idea of going out!

In Wang Xian’s opinion, it was a little difficult for him to increase the strength of a heaven’s origin creator.

His body of the Void Divine Dragon had absorbed the corpses of two control-level powerhouses before he managed to achieve a breakthrough. In order to achieve a rapid breakthrough, he would need even more resources!

In fact, he would even need a lot of time!

He was prepared to go to other universes to see if he could find some opportunities!

Buzz! Buzz

Just as Wang Yun was thinking about where to go…

The Hetian Saint suddenly sent him a message!

After seeing this message, his eyes flickered slightly!

“Dragon King, the Hetian Saint Is Here!”

Not long after, Prime Minister GUI reported!

“Yes, please come in, the Hetian Sage!”

Wang Xian nodded.

After the battle with the Void Universe, the position of the Dragon Palace had improved tremendously in the nine-origin universe.

Now, all the strong disciples knew that the Dragon Palace was the most powerful existence in the nine-origin universe.

There were already three heaven-origin creation-level existences!

The strength of the Dragon King of the Dragon Palace was even more terrifying!

Now, there were experts who guessed that he might be much stronger than the Fallen Shadow Devil Emperor!

Now that Saint Hetian had come to the Dragon Palace, he had to inform and report in advance!

Unknowingly, Wang Xian’s status in the nine-origin universe was already very high!

“Dragon King!”

“Greetings, Dragon King!”

Saint Hetian arrived with a disciple of the saint’s lineage by his side.

Wang Xian knew this disciple, the scholar.

Back then, he was competing with Queen of floating water and the rest for the last water-elemental disciple in the nine-origin universe.

Now, he should be able to achieve a breakthrough!

“HMM, Saint of Unity, is this disciple of your saint’s lineage about to achieve a breakthrough?”

Wang Xian gave them a seat and asked Saint of Unity.

“Yes, Dragon King. I have found a suitable universe.”

The Hetian sage nodded his head and said, “The sky-absorbing universe is a universe with two cultivators in the Heaven’s origin realm. However, the two powerhouses in this universe have the ability to control the universe!”

“No problem. I have time now. I can set off immediately!”

Wang Xian nodded his head. In his opinion, the strength of this universe was not strong. There was no big problem!

“Thank you, Dragon King. Let’s set off as soon as possible!”

“Thank you, Dragon King, for protecting the way!”

Saint Hetian stood up and cupped his hands to express his gratitude.

The scholar even knelt on the ground.

“No need. Get Up. We will rush over immediately!”

Wang Xian waved his hand. A wave of energy enveloped Saint Hetian and the scholar.

“Saint Hetian, show us the way!”

He opened his mouth and led them out.

Wang Xian’s current strength was not something that Saint Hetian could compare to in terms of speed!

Therefore, in order to save time, it was the best choice for him to lead them out.

“Dragon King, in that direction, it’s about a few thousand years away from our nine-origin universe. That place is at the edge of the Justice Sequence Alliance. However, that universe doesn’t belong to the Justice Sequence Alliance. Instead, it’s a neutral universe!”

The Hetian Saint spoke to Wang Xian!

“No problem. It doesn’t matter even if it’s the universe of the Justice Sequence Alliance.”

Wang Xian shook his head.

He had stayed in the justice universe for a period of time.

He had a very clear understanding of the Justice Sequence Alliance.

In the universe of the Justice Sequence Alliance, when they encountered some danger, they had to pay resources to seek help from the experts in the alliance.

After all, it was impossible to be protected by the Alliance just by joining the Alliance!

There was a reward for the effort.

The better part was that the price to join the alliance and seek the protection of the powerhouses was relatively lower.

It was more affordable!

There were still many benefits for a weak universe to join the Justice Sequence Alliance!

Wang Xian had to protect the path for the disciples of the nine-origin universe, regardless of whether they were from the Justice Sequence Alliance or the evil faction.

As a neutral nine-origin universe, he could do whatever he wanted.

Strength was the most important thing.

Moreover, the current strength of the nine-origin universe was strong enough.

“Thank you, Dragon King!”

The Unity Saint said gratefully once again!

“No need. Speaking of which, if it wasn’t for the Emperor of the Phoenix, your saint lineage wouldn’t have suffered such a huge loss!”

Wang Xian shook his head and said nonchalantly.

“This is the good fortune of the saint lineage. We have the universe’s artificial intelligence, so we have to bear some costs!”

The He Tian saint shook his head as well. “This will happen sooner or later. However, with the Dragon King around, this won’t happen again.”

As he spoke, a smile appeared on his face.

Although their saint lineage suffered a huge loss this time, it had something to do with the Dragon King and the Emperor of the Phoenix.

However, in the long run, it would be of great benefit to them.

After this incident, the Void Universe did not dare to step into the Void universe anymore.

Wang Xian smiled and chatted with the unity saint. They quickly shuttled through the Chaos!

“Dragon King, it’s the universe in front of us!”

Three thousand years later, the Unity Saint pointed to a universe in front of them and spoke to Wang Xian!

Wang Xian nodded and looked at the universe in front of him.

During the Cataclysm, the universe was like a huge sun. It was exceptionally eye-catching.

After flying for a full year, Wang Xian and the rest finally arrived at the edge of the universe.

Wang Xian and the rest entered the universe and scanned their surroundings.

The energy contained in the universe was the same as the nine-origin universe.

In fact, most of the universes had the five elements, wind, thunder, and light.

These attributes were the mainstream of the universe!

“Can I make a breakthrough?”

Wang Xian looked at the scholar and asked him.

“Dragon King, there are spots for me to make a breakthrough in this universe!”

The scholar nodded his head.

“Let’s go then. Choose a place to make a breakthrough!”

Wang Xian nodded his head and spoke to him!

Saint he Tian also nodded his head.

They flew forward for some distance to ensure that they had sufficient energy!

It took time for a heaven’s origin powerhouse to break through.

The closer they were to the center of the universe, the more energy there was and the shorter the time needed for a breakthrough!

If they were at the edge of the universe, the time needed for a breakthrough could be several months or even longer.

At the edge of the universe, the water elemental energy was too thin. They flew forward for a day!

“This is more or less the same. Let’s Make a breakthrough!”

After flying for a day, he could sense the existence of life planets in front of him. Wang Xian decided to make a breakthrough here!

Once he made a breakthrough, he would attract the attention of the powerhouses in the Heaven’s origin realm in this universe.

However, Wang Xian did not care!

The strength of this universe was nothing to him!

“It’s the Dragon King!”

The scholar nodded his head in excitement. His body moved and he flew directly into the sky.

Boom

His body shook and a majestic energy was emitted.

The color of the world began to change.

The water elemental energy was gathering towards him.

At this moment, the entire universe could sense that a strong person was breaking through!
